alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:57PM CDT until June 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHICOT...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 857 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winterville, or 7 miles northwest of Greenville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lamont around 900 PM CDT. Greenville and Winterville around 905 PM CDT. Metcalfe around 910 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
